synopsis.text:
Climbing beyond the clouds, young Jack embarks on a whimsical journey in this animated twist on a classic fairy tale. After being tricked into exchanging his family's beloved cow for a handful of magic beans, Jack discovers that these beans grow into a colossal beanstalk reaching the heavens. Ascending the magical vine with his loyal dog Crosby, Jack stumbles upon a fantastical kingdom filled with enchantment and treasure.

In this sky-high realm, Jack encounters the enchanting Princess Margaret, who finds herself under the wicked spell of Madam Noir, an evil witch determined to marry her off to her own grotesque son, Prince Tulip. With the princess's future hanging in the balance, Jack and Crosby, accompanied by a talking mouse named Mii, must navigate the dangers of this vibrant world to save Princess Margaret and restore happiness to the kingdom.

Directed by renowned Japanese animator Gisaburo Sugii, this imaginative adaptation of Jack and the Beanstalk has captivated audiences with its fanciful story and dazzling, colorful design. Join Jack on his thrilling adventure and discover if he can break the witch's curse and find his own happily ever after.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
